tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[FEA8EFE747B6BFEF48AD2AB3CBEF2B13]", "D33891BF417FD738CE031F9ED349FCD5", "As Nodes develop, Mayors may choose to construct new Service Buildings. Keep an eye out for plots under construction, and the Construction Foremen overseeing them!")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "E7166FD24C1496EBA523B6B8DEB9E862", "Construction Foreman collect materials to aid with constriction. Speak to a Foreman to see what materials they require and donate them to increase building progress.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "104ADFF54003E98F7F03299F7865DE64", "Once enough materials have been collected, construction will begin. Work together with your fellow citizens to to develop your Node, and enjoy the fruits of your labor!")
